column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Ff you're a lover of almond paste
column2: this will be the one for you. This is in a toast form with a thick layer of almond paste and dabbles of fruit jam all over with a little decor of gold. There's a sweet crumble on top that is nice and crispy. This is sweet so have something to go with it to balance.
